title: Tower Crash 3D
description: Tower Crash 3D is an exciting casual game that challenges you to demolish towering structures! With physics-based 3D gameplay, only the most skilled crashers can conquer all the towers. Explore beautifully designed levels and shapes, wasting no time in becoming the ultimate tower crasher. Strategize to collapse towers using the given balls, targeting shapes with matching colors to your ball. Unleash the power of earthquake or shotgun power-ups to trigger massive chain reactions, ultimately bringing the towers to their destruction.
